document_data.name: Diminish Breath Weapon
document_data.mainbody: '''''Diminish breath weapon''''' was a spell that was used against [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell targeted the [[dragon breath|breath weapon]] of the targeted dragon. The spell significantly reduced the damage normally inflicted by said breath weapon.
document_data.Components: This spell only required a [[verbal component]]. The spell's strength could be increased if, during casting, the ashes of a valuable object were sprinkled by the caster. The object had to have been either damaged or destroyed by the breath weapon of the targeted dragon and had to have a value of over 100 [[gp]].
